parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From philos; to be a friend to (an individual or an object), i.e. Have affection for; specially, to kiss.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I reprove, rebuke, discipline, (b) I expose, show to be guilty. Of uncertain affinity; to confute, admonish.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From pais; to train up a child, i.e. Educate, or, discipline.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From zelos; to have warmth of feeling for or against.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
